price: Àwọn àgbààgbà tó ṣàì gbàgbọ́ nínú ìjọ rẹ̀ wí pé: “Dájúdájú tí ẹ̀yin bá tẹ̀lé Ṣu‘aeb, nígbà náà ẹ̀yin ti di ẹni òfò nìyẹn.”
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن قَوۡمِهِۦ لَئِنِ ٱتَّبَعۡتُمۡ شُعَيۡبًا إِنَّكُمۡ إِذٗا لَّخَٰسِرُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: waqāla al-mala-u alladhīna kafarū min qawmihi la-ini ittabaʿtum shuʿayban innakum idhan lakhāsirūna
